forecaster.canada.accounts module¶

A module for Canada-specific ledger subclasses.

class forecaster.canada.accounts.PrincipleResidence(owner, balance=0, rate=0, transactions=None, nper=1, inputs=None, initial_year=None)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.accounts.Account

A Canadian principle residence. Gains in value are not taxable.

next_contribution_room()[source]¶

Determines the amount of contribution room for next year.

Parameters:
  • income (Money) – The amount of taxable income for this year used to calculate RRSP contribution room.
  • year (int) – The year in which the income is received.
Returns:

The contribution room for the RRSP for the year after year.

class forecaster.canada.accounts.TaxableAccount(owner, balance=0, rate=0, transactions=None, nper=1, inputs=None, initial_year=None, acb=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.accounts.Account

A taxable account, non-registered account.

This account uses Canadian rules for determining taxable income from capital assets. That involves tracking the adjusted cost base (acb) of the assets.

acb¶

Money – The adjusted cost base of the assets in the account at the start of the year.

capital_gain¶

Money – The total capital gains for the year. This is evaluated lazily, so it may return different values if you add or remove transactions.

See Account for other attributes.
acb

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

acb_history¶

Record of acb over all past years.
